content: जीवित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [जीव्-कर्तरि क्त] {@--1@} Living, existent, alive; <ls>R. 12. 75.</ls> {@--2@} Returned to life, revived. {@--3@} Animated, enlivened. {@--4@} Lived through (as a period). --तं {@--1@} Life, existence; त्वं जीवितं त्वमसि मे हृदय द्वितीयं <ls>U. 3. 26</ls>; कन्येयं कुलजीवितं <ls>Ku. 6. 63</ls>; <ls>Me. 83</ls>; नाभिनंदेत मरणं नभिनंदेत जीवितं <ls>Ms. 6. 45</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 111.</ls> {@--2@} Duration of life. {@--3@} Livelihood. {@--4@} A living being.
